title: installing libxcb on ubuntu 1604 fails
body:
I've noticed that some packages require the installer to be root (so 'install' can run), while others the reverse.

For libxcb, neither of the options work.  If I install as root, the install phase complains that it cannot change ownership of files.  If I install as a normal user, the install phase complains that it doesn't have permission to install.

Packages are installed on an NFS mount.  I have users squashed on the server, but I didn't see any requirement in your "filesystem requirements" page that says anything about not setting squash.

Weird thing is that on centos there is no issue.

Here are (some of) the errors:

Non-root:

```
/usr/bin/install: setting permissions for ‘/NAS/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu16-x86_64/gcc-5.4.0/libxcb-1.12-iciyjvqwvvy6cjpshdyabwa26vjdya4s/share/man/man3/xcb_change_keyboard_control.3’: Operation not permitted
/usr/bin/install: setting permissions for ‘/NAS/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu16-x86_64/gcc-5.4.0/libxcb-1.12-iciyjvqwvvy6cjpshdyabwa26vjdya4s/share/man/man3/xcb_change_keyboard_control_checked.3’: Operation not permitted
/usr/bin/install: setting permissions for ‘/NAS/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu16-x86_64/gcc-5.4.0/libxcb-1.12-iciyjvqwvvy6cjpshdyabwa26vjdya4s/share/man/man3/xcb_change_keyboard_mapping.3’: Operation not permitted
/usr/bin/install: setting permissions for ‘/NAS/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu16-x86_64/gcc-5.4.0/libxcb-1.12-iciyjvqwvvy6cjpshdyabwa26vjdya4s/share/man/man3/xcb_change_keyboard_mapping_checked.3’: Operation not permitted
/usr/bin/install: setting permissions for ‘/NAS/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu16-x86_64/gcc-5.4.0/libxcb-1.12-iciyjvqwvvy6cjpshdyabwa26vjdya4s/share/man/man3/xcb_change_pointer_control.3’: Operation not permitted
sed: couldn't write 1857 items to stdout: Broken pipe
Makefile:1007: recipe for target 'install-libmanDATA' failed
make[3]: *** [install-libmanDATA] Error 1

```

Root:

Any help is appreciated.
